sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not failor overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Chuyen Nguyen
diff.description: Add opd patient queue tables
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS opd_patient_queue (id integer not null auto_increment, user integer, patient_id integer, referral_concept_id integer, opd_concept_id integer, age integer, created_on datetime, opd_concept_name varchar(255), patient_name varchar(255), referral_concept_name varchar(255), sex varchar(255), status varchar(255), primary key (id)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS opd_patient_queue_log (id integer not null auto_increment, user integer, patient_id integer, referral_concept_id integer, opd_concept_id integer, age integer, created_on datetime, opd_concept_name varchar(255), patient_name varchar(255), referral_concept_name varchar(255), sex varchar(255), status varchar(255), primary key (id));

diff.author: Viet Nguyen
diff.description: Add column patient indentifier for opd_patient_queue table

diff.author: Viet Nguyen
diff.description: Add column birth_date for opd_patient_queue table

diff.author: Chuyen Nguyen
diff.description: Add ipd patient queue tables

diff.author: Chuyen Nguyen
diff.description: Add Obs group and ipd encounter columns to ipd_patient_admission_log table
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admission_log ADD opd_obs_group_id integer; ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admission_log ADD ipd_encounter_id integer;

diff.author: Chuyen Nguyen
diff.description: Add department , department ward, deparment diagnosis procedure

diff.author: Chuyen Nguyen
diff.description: Change column admission_date to transfer_discharge_date in ipd_patient_admitted_log
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admitted_log CHANGE admission_date transfer_discharge_date datetime;

diff.author: Truong Ha
diff.description: Create table radiology_department and radiology_department_investigation

diff.author: Truong Ha
diff.description: Add encounter forgeinkey to opd queue log
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE opd_patient_queue_log ADD encounter_id integer default 0;

diff.author: Truong Ha
diff.description: Add table core form
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `core_form` ( `core_form_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(120) DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `content` varchar(20480) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `created_on` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`core_form_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Truong Ha
diff.description: Add column after_submit
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE core_form ADD after_submit varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL;

diff.author: Truong Ha
diff.description: Add table patient search
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `patient_search` ( `patient_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `identifier` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `fullname` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `given_name` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `middle_name` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `family_name` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `gender` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `birthdate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `age` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `person_name_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`patient_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Create table opd_order
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `opd_test_order` ( `opd_order_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `patient_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `encounter_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `concept_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `type_concept` int(11) NOT NULL, `value_coded` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `billing_status` smallint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `cancel_status` smallint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`opd_order_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Create table ipd_vital_statistics
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ipd_vital_statistics` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `patient_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `ipd_patientadmissionlog_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `blood_pressure` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `pulse_rate` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `temperature` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `diet_advised` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `note` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Create table opd_drug_order
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `opd_drug_order` ( `opd_drug_order_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `patient_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `encounter_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `inventory_drug_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `formulation_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `frequency_concept_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `no_of_days` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `comments` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `order_status` smallint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `cancel_status` smallint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`opd_drug_order_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: harsh
diff.description: Create table ward_bed_strength
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ward_bed_strength` ( `ward_bed_strength_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `concept_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `bed_strength` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ward_bed_strength_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Kesavulu loka
diff.description: Add column otherInstructions for ipd_patient_admitted_log table
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admitted_log ADD COLUMN `other_instructions` varchar(250) default NULL;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column billable_service_id for opd_test_order table
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE opd_test_order ADD COLUMN `billable_service_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column comments for ipd_patient_admitted table
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admitted ADD COLUMN `comments` varchar(100) default NULL;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column comments for ipd_patient_admitted_log table
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admitted_log ADD COLUMN `comments` varchar(100) default NULL;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add triage patient queue tables
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS triage_patient_queue (id integer not null auto_increment, user integer, patient_id integer, referral_concept_id integer, triage_concept_id integer, created_on datetime, triage_concept_name varchar(255), patient_name varchar(255), referral_concept_name varchar(255), sex varchar(255), status varchar(255), patient_identifier varchar(50) default NULL, birth_date datetime default NULL, primary key (id)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS triage_patient_queue_log (id integer not null auto_increment, user integer, patient_id integer, referral_concept_id integer, triage_concept_id integer, created_on datetime, triage_concept_name varchar(255), patient_name varchar(255), referral_concept_name varchar(255), sex varchar(255), status varchar(255), patient_identifier varchar(50) default NULL, birth_date datetime default NULL, encounter_id integer default 0, primary key (id));

diff.author: sagar
diff.description: Create table triage_patient_data to add capture information in triage fields.
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS triage_patient_data (id INTEGER NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, triage_log_id INTEGER, `weight` DECIMAL(5,2), `height` DECIMAL(5,2), `temperature` DECIMAL(5,2), `systolic` int(5), `daistolic` int(5), `respiratory_rate` int(5), `pulse_rate` int(5), `blood_group` VARCHAR(10), `last_menstrual` DATETIME, `rhesus_factor` VARCHAR(12), `pitct` VARCHAR(12), created_on DATETIME, PRIMARY KEY (id));

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column triage_data_id for opd_patient_queue table and opd_patient_queue_log

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column dead for 'patient_search' table
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE patient_search ADD dead smallint(6) DEFAULT 0;

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column for knowing the status of Patient as Indoor or outdoor

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column chief,sub_chief,religion in ipd_patient_admitted table and in ipd_patient_admitted_log table
diff.sql:
ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admitted ADD COLUMN `chief` VARCHAR(50) default NULL, ADD COLUMN `sub_chief` VARCHAR(50) default NULL, ADD COLUMN `religion` VARCHAR(20) default NULL;
ALTER TABLE ipd_patient_admitted_log ADD COLUMN `chief` VARCHAR(50) default NULL, ADD COLUMN `sub_chief` VARCHAR(50) default NULL, ADD COLUMN `religion` VARCHAR(20) default NULL;

diff.author: Luan Vo
diff.description: Multiple parent mainstores
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inventory_store_relationship (inventory_store_child_id integer not null, inventory_store_parent_id integer not null, primary key (inventory_store_child_id, inventory_store_parent_id));

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column for keeping schedule date for minor OT procedures

diff.author: ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column visit_outcome for opd_patient_queue_log
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE opd_patient_queue_log ADD COLUMN `visit_outcome` VARCHAR(21) default NULL;

diff.author: Thai Chuong
diff.description: Add column mainstore_id to store the assigned mainstore when indent drug

diff.author: Sagar Bele
diff.description: Add columns to capture more patient information in traige
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE triage_patient_data ADD COLUMN `mua` DECIMAL(5,2), ADD COLUMN `chest` DECIMAL(5,2), ADD COLUMN `abdominal` DECIMAL(5,2);

diff.author: Sagar Bele
diff.description: Create table to store patient past medical and surgical history

diff.author: Ghanshyam
diff.description: create table symptom,question,answer

diff.author: Ghanshyam
diff.description: Add columns to capture more patient information in traige

diff.author: Ghanshyam
diff.description: Add column visit_status

diff.author: Amit
diff.description: Add column referral_opd_name
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE opd_test_order ADD COLUMN `referral_opd_name` VARCHAR(100) default NULL;
